application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: Trees T1 to T23 are all Platanus x hispanica.T1 (0W2U): Tip reduce limb to south and SSE 2m and lift rest of southerly crown until 1 m above wall.T2 (0W2T): Thin main southern lower crown section by 20%. Drop crotch thin inner crown to SW by 30%.T3 (0W2S): Drop crotch thin central lower limb to SSW by 20%.T4 (0W2R): Thin lower section of lowest limb to SE 30%. Drop crotch lower branches by 30% on lowest limb to SSW.T5 (0W2Q): Tip back southern lower crown by 1m.T6 (0W2P): Thin lower central limb tips by 30% and shorten lower limb SSW by 1m.T7 (0W2N): Thin lower central limb by 30%.T8 (0W2M): Tip back central lower branch by 1m and drop crotch lowest branch by 2m on the lower limb to SW.T9 (0W2L): Thin all lowest branches to south by 30%.T10 (0W2K): Thin two lowest central limbs to south and SSW by 30%.T11 (0W2J): Lift lowest central limbs to south by 1m and remove lower fork of lowest limb SSW.T12 (0W2H): Remove lower fork of central limb to south and lift remaining branches to south by 1m.T13 (0W28): Thin central lower limb to south by 30% and lift remaining branches by 1m.T14 (0W27): Thin central lower limbs to south by 30% and drop crotch each of lower limb SSW by 2m.T15 (0W26): Thin both lower limbs to south by 30% and lift remaining by 1m.T16 (0W25): Thin central lower crown to south and lowest limb by 30%.T17 (0W24): Drop crotch lift central lower crown to south by 2m.T18 (0W23): Drop crotch central lower limb to south back 2.5m, thin lowest branches by 20%.T19 (0W22): Drop crotch central lowest limb to south back 2mT20 (0W21): Tip back lowest branches to south by 1m.T21 (0W20): Thin central lowest limb to south 20% and lift remaining branches 1m.T22 (0W1Z) Drop crotch lowest limb SSW back 2m. Thin central lower crown to south 20%.T23 (0W1Y): Drop crotch lift lowest branches to south 1m.
decision_conditions: work in accordance with British Standard
